description:
The bloodthirsty crowd hurls insults at Rebecca as the battle of Block D begins. On the other side of the island, Law finds himself on the losing end of his battle with Doflamingo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dernière mêlée générale. Le Bloc D au combat !
Saigo no Chou Gekisen Ku - D Block Kaisen
The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!
Последнее сражение. Бой в блоке D
المجموعة الأخيرة والأكثر دمويّة! تبدأ معركة المجموعة د!
最後の超激戦区 Dブロック開戦
